title: How many losses on Div 5 before being demoted?
body: i was just wondering how many games do you have to lose in order to be demoted for lets say silver 5 to bronze 1?

replies.body:
A LOT. it takes quite a while to drop tiers. Unlike dropping regular divisions, dropping tiers requires you to be 5 whole divisions worse then your current rank.

As your example, to drop from Silver 5 to Bronze 1, you need to have the same MMR as Bronze 5. So its usually safe to say, its really hard to drop tiers if you are below Plat since there is no decay and you have to lose an awful lot.
I have lost 3 games in a row in one division and didn't drop so it's safe to say alot
